data.name: Crusader Kings II: Songs of Byzantium
data.detailed_description:
Songs of Byzantium contains three new songs, totaling more than 10 minutes, composed by the talented Andreas Waldetoft. These songs give more depth to your game playing experience as you play characters in the Byzantine Empire and other Greek, Armenian or Georgian states.

  • Komnenos
  • The Legacy of Rome
  • The Byzantine Empire
data.about_the_game:
Songs of Byzantium contains three new songs, totaling more than 10 minutes, composed by the talented Andreas Waldetoft. These songs give more depth to your game playing experience as you play characters in the Byzantine Empire and other Greek, Armenian or Georgian states.

  • Komnenos
  • The Legacy of Rome
  • The Byzantine Empire
data.short_description: Songs of Byzantium contains three new songs, totaling more than 10 minutes, composed by the talented Andreas Waldetoft. These songs give more depth to your game playing experience as you play characters in the Byzantine Empire and other Greek, Armenian or Georgian states.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS:Windows XP/Vista/7
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® IV 2.4 GHz or AMD 3500+
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:NVIDIA® GeForce 8800 or ATI Radeon® X1900 video card, 512Mb graphics memory required
  • DirectX®:9.0
  • Hard Drive:2 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX compatible sound card
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional:3-button mouse, keyboard, speakers, Internet connection for multiplayer, resolution at least 1024 x 768, Requires the base game Crusader Kings II
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Additional:3-button mouse, keyboard, speakers, Internet connection for multiplayer, resolution at least 1024 x 768, Requires the base game Crusader Kings II

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS:Mac OS X 10.6.8 or later
  • Processor:Intel Core Duo Processor (2GHz or better)
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:ATI Radeon HD 6750 / NVIDIA GeForce 320 / NVIDIA GeForce 9600 or higher
  • Hard Drive:2 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional:3-button mouse, keyboard, speakers, Internet connection for multiplayer, resolution at least 1024 x 768, Requires the base game Crusader Kings II
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Additional:3-button mouse, keyboard, speakers, Internet connection for multiplayer, resolution at least 1024 x 768, Requires the base game Crusader Kings II

linux_requirements.minimum:
• OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS
  • Processor: IntelR PentiumR IV 2.4 GHz or AMD 3500+
  • Memory: 2 GB
  • Hard disk space: 2 Gb
  • Video Card: ATI Radeon HD 6750 / NVIDIA GeForce 320 / NVIDIA GeForce > 9600 or higher, 1024MB graphics memory required.
